The library has a special division for handling the publishing of printed materials.

How to Obtain the National Library Publications?
One can purchase the National Library publication in the library. These are also sent by post, if one pays the price through M.O. or Demand Draft in advance. The publications are sent by V.P.P for the postal charges. The M.O./ D.D. are to be addressed and drawn in favour of ‘The Director General, National Library, Kolkata’, payable at Kolkata.
